subject: Dear Beloved,
body:
Dear Beloved,
I know this letter may come to you as a surprise after a long while
you have not heard from me. Well I am writing to inform you that I
have succeeded in concluding the transaction you abandoned, with a man
from Japan, because Mrs.Mary have to continue with her treatment at
the hospital and I want her dream be realized by bring this Japanese
man to accomplish this dream since you have abandon the
project,Actually this man put all his resources and efforts to
actualize this transaction with the help of Payment Officer Access
bank of London PLC Mr. Louis Young.
This Japanese man completed the entire financial obligation to the
paying bank in London before everything took place.Be informed that I
am right now in Colorado USA with my entire family after I might have
received my own portion of CHECK that came through the Access bank of
London PLC because all the transfer works under the umbrella of Access
bank of London PLC that is why the CHECK emanated from there. For
your information when we are issuing the CHECK one by one, I
mentioned your name to the Access bank of London PLC officials,as
someone who is aware of this transaction before, It brought a lot
of-calamity and questions concerning you but you were finally
considered to have issued a CHECK of US$7,500,000.00 {Seven Millions
Five hundred thousand USD only}so that you will not reveal this deal
to anybody in
order not to involve or implicate the Access bank of London PLC
officials into problem and my friend in Japan has Donated $1 Million
for the less privileged once and the orphanage homes.
The CHECK issued on your name is right now with my personal secretary
and is confidant in USA for an Oil Business, so I will give you
his contact in USA as to enable you reach him on how to get the
CHECK. Please keep everything concerning this CHECK secret till he
directs you on how it will be cashed over there in your country.
Kindly digest this mail very well and let me know as soon as you get
in contact with him so contact him with this e-mail
address{markanthonyfile111@gmail.com
}, Is Mr. Mark Anthony.So go ahead
and contact him for your CHECK.
Take note this is my WhatSapp phone number in USA you are free
to call me for more discussion +17086677763.You ca till contact
ViaSKYPE;davidrivassteve
I wait for your response.
Dr.David Rivas Steve.

subject: Re:   Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello Rivas Steve,

I hope this message finds you well. I must say, your letter was quite a surprise! It's been a while indeed since we last communicated. 

It's great to hear that you've managed to conclude the project with the help of a Japanese man. I'm glad to know that things are moving forward and that you're now in Colorado with your family. That sounds like a wonderful place to be.

The news about the check is unexpected but appreciated. However, I have some questions for clarity. Could you please explain why my name was mentioned during the issuance of the check? Also, could you provide more details about Mr. Mark who is currently holding the check?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Beloved,
body:
Dear William,

Thank for the urgent reply it was Mrs.Mary that mentioned you name during
the issuance of the check the contact details about Mr. Mark who is
currently holding the check is via  e-mail
address{markanthonyfile111@gmail.com}, Is Mr. Mark Anthony.So go ahead and
contact him for your CHECK.

I wait for your response.

Dr.David Rivas Steve.

subject: Re: Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello Rivas Steve,

Thank you so much for your prompt response. It's really exciting to hear about this check! I'm a bit confused though, could you please clarify who Mr. Mark is? And how did my name come up during the issuance of the check?

I'm looking forward to hearing more about this.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello William,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm writing to you in response to your urgent reply. It was indeed during the issuance of the check that your name was mentioned.

As for Mr. Mark, who is currently holding the check, I understand that you might need his contact details. However, I'm afraid I can't provide them at this moment due to privacy concerns.

Could you please tell me more about how you know Mr. Mark and why you need his contact information? This will help me understand better and possibly assist you further.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello William,

Confirm your personal details like your NAME,ADDRESS,PHONE AND A SCAN COPY
OF YOUR IDENTIFICATION CARD.This is my Whats app phone number +13127419724
you can chat me or call me on whats app.

I am waiting your urgent response to this mail.

MARK ANTHONY.

subject: Re: Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello Mark Anthony,

It's great to hear from you! I'm always excited to chat and learn more. However, I must apologize as I am not comfortable sharing personal details or any scanned copies online. 

I'd love to know more about what you do though. Could you tell me a bit more about your work? What kind of projects are you currently involved in?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello William,

Before we go further you must provide with Confirm your personal details
like your NAME,ADDRESS,PHONE AND A SCAN COPY OF YOUR IDENTIFICATION
CARD.without this information we cannot say or do anything regarding
claiming the check.

I am waiting your urgent response to this mail.

MARK ANTHONY.

subject: Re: Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello Mark Anthony,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm really excited about this opportunity, but I must admit, I'm a bit confused. Could you please explain more about the process and why these details are necessary? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello Mark Anthony,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm really excited about this opportunity, but I have a few questions before we proceed. Could you please explain more about the check and why it's necessary to provide personal details? Also, could you tell me more about your company and its operations?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello ,

The reason for your details and why it is necessary is to confirm if we are
dealing with the right person without your details the process of this
check CANNOT be disclosed to you.

I am waiting for your urgent response to this mail.

MARK ANTHONY

subject: Re: Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello Mark Anthony,

Thank you for your prompt response. I understand the need for verification, but I'm a bit confused about the process. Could you please explain it to me in more detail? What kind of check are we talking about here? And how does it work exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello Mark Anthony,

Thank you for your prompt response. I understand the need for verification, but I'm a bit confused about the process. Could you please explain it to me in more detail? What kind of check are we talking about here? And how does this process work exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello ,

This will be my last mail to you since you are not ready to provide your
details to confirm there is no need talking with you again BYE

MARK ANTHONY.

subject: Re: Dear Beloved,
body:
Hello Mark Anthony,

I'm sorry if I gave you the impression that I'm not interested in our conversation. I am indeed interested, but I just need to understand more about what we're discussing. Could you please provide me with more details? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
William
